data.text:
Historically speaking, the jewelry of precious metals and stones in India has always been important since time immemorial. India has always been known for using gold jewelry for personal as well as religious purposes. The traditional jewelry makes Indian weddings so rich and unique. Different region of India has different art and design of the jewelry that they wear, and each of the jewelry pieces and its amazing design will leave you enchanted with its look. India is known to be among the largest supplier and dealers in jewelry and precious and semi-precious stones. In the global market, India is a leading exporter, and in 2021 it contributed US$ 3.43 billion to the

Export of Jewellery and Gems in the World. The major jewelry brands of India contribute 15% to its total merchandise export and 7% to the GDP of the country.

As we are one of the biggest exporters of jewelry, there is an apex body to manage it known as The Gem & Jewellery Promotion Council. It was established in 1996, and its headquarters is in Mumbai. There are more than 3,00,000 jewelry and gems players in this sector. You will probably be surprised to know that 14 out of every 15 diamonds sold in the world are cut or polished in India.

If you are someone who is looking for the top jewelers in India and surrounded by doubts regarding trustability, making charges and ranges of products, we got you covered. Many of these jewelers deal online as well, and you can easily purchase their products online too. Let's take a look at the Top 10 Jewellers of India:

1. Tanishq

Tanishq is India's first jewelry retail brand and is a division of Titan Company limited which is a part of Tata Group, and TIDCO (Tamil Nadu Industrial Development Corporation) joint venture started in 1984. Tanishq, a jewelry brand, was founded in 1994, and its headquarters is in Bengaluru, Karnataka. This brand serves all over the world. In 2014 it started to export to the UAE. Tanishq has more than 160 stores across the country, and it offers a wide range of jewelry designs, from green emeralds to diamonds, gold, platinum, etc. It has launched a sub-brand in 2017 called Rivaah to cater to the wedding segment; in the same year, it also launched its first men's line of products called Aveer.

The company itself ensures the lowest making charges and purity of their gold, and it is one of the most trusted brands by the people in India, which always has a high demand. It has high quality and exceptional jewelry design with the best exchange value. There is no way that you are going to regret choosing Tanishq.

2. PC Jeweller

It is one of the most reputed and renowned brands of jewelry in India. It has gained popularity in a very short duration of time. It was founded in 2005 in New Delhi by two brothers, Padam Chand Gupta and Balram Garg. In 19 states and 70 cities, it has 84 stores in total. This brand is involved in the manufacture, wholesale, export, retail of diamond and gold pieces of jewelry. This company is known to provide outstanding diamond pieces of jewelry at a very reasonable price to their customers. PC jewelers is a customer-centric company and meet the expectations of their customer with their exquisite creations of engagement or wedding ring.

It has won many accolades and awards too. PC jewelers were ranked at 40th position in 2019 in the global list of Top 100 Luxury Goods Companies. They also have sub-brands like Mirosa, Azva, Inayat, Love Gold, Lal Quila, and Swarn Dharohar. They always work tactically on their product range, launching new collections and designs as well as high-margin jewelry.

3. Kalyan Jewellers India Ltd

It is important to include Kalyan jewelers when we talk about top jewelers of our country. It has been serving in this business for more than two decades and has built its reputation with its quality products and services. T.S. Kalyanaraman founded it in 1993 in Thrissur, Kerala. It has stores in all the major cities of the country, and it also serves Middle East Asia. Initially, they had strengthened their position in the South Indian market of Kerala, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, Telangana and later expanded to the rest of India. It opened 6 showrooms in UAE in a day in the year 2013. It has 107 stores across India and 30 stores in the Middle East across Qatar, Oman, UAE, and Kuwait.

To buy wedding jewelry, they offer advance booking through their customer service center called My Kalyan. They have launched various product lines for different types of jewelry like Muhurat for wedding jewelry, Nimah for timeless heritage jewelry, Mudhra for Handcrafted Antique Jewellery, etc. They have a wide range of collections that showcase their craftsmanship and care for Indian diversity and heritage. Kalyan Jewelers offer authentic and high-quality diamonds and other precious stones and metals.

4. Malabar Gold & Diamonds

Malabar Gold & Diamonds is an Indian company that its visionary founder, M.P. Ahammed, established. He established this company in 1993, and its headquarter is in Kozhikode, Kerala. This jewelry brand has more than 260 stores in 10 countries such as India, UAE, USA, Kuwait, Singapore, Qatar, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman. It is among the largest chain of jewelry showrooms in the world. This company also runs a network of boutiques of luxury watches across India by the name of Malabar watches.

The company provides high-quality products and top-notch customer service. It also offers its customer a buyback policy and insured jewelry that is budget-friendly. There are different types of jewelry that they specialize in, like Meenakari, Kashmira, Turkish, Kundan, and traditional hand-crafted jewelry. The different lines of a collection of brands are Mine for Diamond Jewelry, Divine for Indian Heritage Jewellery, Precia for Precious Gems Jewelry, Starlet for Kid's Jewellery, etc.

5. Reliance Jewels

Reliance Jewels is a part of the reliance industry. Its focus is to provide their customer with a wide range of innovative and top-notch jewelry. They deal in 100% BIS Hallmarked Gold. They provide their customers with different styles and designs of jewelry like the temple, Filigree, Polki Kundan, and contemporary diamonds jewelry and solitaire. For the satisfaction of customers, they have Karat meters in every showroom so that customers can be assured of the purity of gold free of cost. Reliance jewels have more than 100 showrooms across India. They also offer Customer-first service, which includes services like jewelry cleaning and polishing, customization, karat meters, and Quality Control Tech rooms.

6. Senco Gold and Diamonds

Senco Gold and Diamonds are one-stop destinations to buy platinum, diamonds, and gold jewelry designs. This Jewelry company originated in Calcutta in 1938, but the company was originally incorporated as Senco Gold Private Limited in August 1994. The company has a legacy of over five decades of providing their customers' art and creativity, karigari, and passion with their jewelry designs.

Their products are very affordable due to the affordability they provide in their categories. They are quite popular for their cocktail rings. They also provide digital online services, and they stand on top of the list in doing so. They provide a variety of services online like Silver and Gold bookings, online Swarno Yojna, booking online video calls, and trying on jewelry virtually. You will love to buy from this brand if you like timeless pieces of jewelry, matchless exquisite designs that seasoned artisans craft.

7. Tribhovandas Bhimji Zaveri Ltd

TBZ or Tribhovandas Bhimji Zaveri is a noted Indian jeweler and jewelry retail chain that was established in 1864 in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Currently, the company has a presence in 23 cities in 11 states and 37 showrooms, including Surat, Mumbai, Kochi, Hyderabad, Bhopal, Rajkot, Kolkata, etc. It also owns two designer boutiques Krsna, which is famous for its Diamond studded and Jadau jewelry. Its main showroom in Zaveri Bazar is built on five floors and is claimed to be the largest jewelry showroom in India.

It has gained popularity among people for its heritage and traditional jewelry designs. Their loyalty, trust, and awe-inspiring craftsmanship make them the best jewelers in India. They have a wide array of designs from contemporary Indian jewelry, artistic statement jewelry to a combination of Italian styles of jewelry. They specialize in custom-made jewelry, personalized customer service, and professionalism and integrity.

8. Joyalukkas Jewellers

Joyalukkas is an Indian multinational jewelry group that came into existence in 2001 after bifurcation from its parent company Alukkas Group. It was founded by Joy Alukkas, who is also the chairman of the group. It is an ISO-certified company based in Thrissur, Kerala, and Dubai, UAE. This company has 130 showrooms across the globe, out of which 45 showrooms were established globally, and 85 showrooms are in India.

They are immensely proud of their versatile jewelry products and top-notch designs that are backed by innovation and incomparable value that adhere to the process and create great value. The company is growing rapidly and has numerous loyal customers in 11 countries. Joyalukkas has an association with the diamond brand Forevermark which is a part of the group De Beers. It has also won the award for Superbrand in UAE for 8 consecutive years.

9. Bhima Jewellers

It is a jewelry retail company founded in 1925 by Bhima Bhattar in Kochi, Kerala. It serves south India and UAE and has 36 shops in south India. It has highly skilled individuals in its team who are thriving to exceed the expectations of its customers. They make a variety of diamond, platinum, and gold jewelry that exhibit the diverse culture of India, such as Nellore color stone studded jewelry, Bengali heavyweight design, Karwar precious stone studded jewelry, traditional Kerala and Tamil Nadu designs.

Further, they also provide the service of customization to fulfill the need of their customers. They claim to have lasted machinery and technological equipment in their workshop. They always take care of the precision and quality of their products for the satisfaction of the customers.

10. Shubh Jewellers

Shubh Jewellers is a jewelry showroom by Rajesh Exports Limited- an Indian multinational gold retailer that was established in 1995 in Bangalore, Karnataka. Shubh Jewellers showroom was launched in 2012, and currently, it has 80 functional showrooms all over Karnataka. They have a collection of the finest and unique designs of jewelry. It has a fully Hallmarked REL facility where they manufacture all their premier jewelry. Its parent company Rajesh Exports Limited was ranked 7th in Fortune India 500 List 2020 with a revenue of ₹1.96 trillion. It acquired the world's largest gold refiner Valcambi of Balerna, Switzerland. It is planning to expand its retailer showroom Shubh Jewelers.
